name: Tegan
overview: Tegan is passionate about coral reefs and spends her time ensuring they thrive in the aquarium.
fun_fact: Tegan once swam with sharks in the Maldives and called it a relaxing experience.

name: Morgan
overview: Morgan enjoys designing innovative habitats for the aquarium's unique residents.
fun_fact: Morgan has a pet seahorse named Bubbles.

name: Immy
overview: Immy specialises in maintaining the health and happiness of freshwater fish.
fun_fact: Immy can identify over 200 fish species by sight alone.

name: Sophie
overview: Sophie is dedicated to ensuring the jellyfish exhibits look spectacular every day.
fun_fact: Sophie once accidentally fed herself the fish food while multitasking.

name: Trinity
overview: Trinity oversees the aquarium's breeding programmes for rare species.
fun_fact: Trinity once trained a crab to follow a laser pointer.

name: Lee
overview: Lee is an expert in aquatic plant care and aquascaping.
fun_fact: Lee's dream is to create the world's largest underwater garden.

name: Natasha
overview: Natasha ensures the aquarium's water quality is always perfect.
fun_fact: Natasha has a collection of over 100 sea-themed socks.

name: Hannah
overview: Hannah is responsible for the wellbeing of the aquarium's largest inhabitants.
fun_fact: Hannah once shared her lunch with a hungry otter by accident.
